specificationSector.vehicleDescription: Mahindra e-Veritoe has 1 Electric Engine on offer. It is available with direct injection fuel system.The e2o NXT is a 5 seater Sedan.
Dzire comes with Co. Driver Side Sunvisor with Vanity Mirror Driver Side Sunvisor with Ticket Holder Front Door Armrest with Fabric.
The Hyundai Xcent comes up with Eco Coating Technology, Wireless Phone Charger, Luggage LampLeather wrapped Gear Knob.
It has Intelligent Forward Collision Warning Automatic Emergency Braking RearView Monitor 16" Steel wheels with bolt-on wheel covers.
Space-saving spare wheel (steel) Front centre arm rest with storage boxFront seats with height adjustment.
The additional features of Jeep Compass are Bi-Xenon Or HID Headlamps, Electronic Parking Brake, Curtain Airbags and Auto-Dimming.
Premium Black Interiors, Soft Touch Pad on Dashboard, Inside Door Handles-Metal Paint, Metal Pedals, Digital Instrument Cluster.
The MG ZS EV has 1 Electric Engine on offer. It is available with the Automatic transmission. It has a power of 140.8bhp@3500rpm.
Rear Seat Flip & Fold, Driver Side Footrest, Dust & Pollen Filter, Co-Driver Side Vanity Lamp, Sunglass Holder In Overhead Console.
Dual Front Advanced Airbags Dual Front Seat-Mounted Side Airbags Full-Length Side Curtain Airbags Driver's Side Knee Airbag Seat.
ALto 800 comes up with Assist Grips (Co - Dr. + Rear), Sun Visor ( Dr. ), Front Door Trim Map Pocket, Front Door Trim Map Pocket.
The Volkswagen Polo consist of additional features like Chrome Application On Air Dam GT Badge On Front Grille and GT Doorstep Garnish.
The Tata Tiago has 1 Petrol Engine. It is available with the Manual and Automatic transmission. The has a wheelbase of 2400mm.
The Maruti Baleno comes up with extra features such as Driver and Co Driver Visor, Rear Parcel Shelf, Co Driver Vanity Lamp, and UV Cut.
KWID Parking Brake Console, Mono Tone Dashboard, Rear Parcel Tray, Door Map Storage, Open Storage In Front of the passenger.
e20 PLUS has a power of 19KW@3500rpm with 2 phase ac induction motors. Its controller volume is 600 Amp or 550 Apm.
i20 coupe comes up wirh multi-point indirect injection fuel system, wheelbase of 2570mm, steering rack.
Mustang has Illuminated Driver Sun Visor,Front Carpet Floor Mats, Leather Handbrake Grips, Locking Center Console Bin.
The GLE Coupé can assist you in almost any driving situation and safety systems Driving Assistance package, Parking package.
Maruti Omni CARGO is a complete van with its two rear sliding doors, rear hatch tail gate and an almost box shaped body.
